messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Captain jhonson luther field the scientist is to be killed on sight

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The traitor that worked in science who will not be named has been caught and is being punished accordingly, have a safe shift

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: There is still a posibility for traitors to be abroad the ship, any information is helpful and turning yourself in will result in a more humane death!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Earl scruggs please come to bridge, failure to do so will result in immideate arrest and potential execution

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Earl you have 2 minutes as of now, otherwise all personnel will be ordered to kill you on sight

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.
